title: Port forwarding
body:
Recently ,I have been having a problem with the loading screen ,as  it freezes to 0% then the game crashes with a popping message " you have disconnected . check your internet connection". I did search for a solution in riot support link , the solution was modifying  the router by opening a site  which seems like this "192.168" then search for the word Port forward , NAT ,etc

I found NAT but there wasn't any category in it that can port forward or having the least similarity to a page of the port forwarding  i want ,as i have seen in sites that the normal router sites had a category named " apps and games " where you can port forward  , but mine didn't have any thing similar to that .

what should i do ?

replies.body:
There's actually a really helpful site that goes over specific steps of port forwarding *many* different brands of Modems/Routers. You can find it [here.](https://portforward.com/router.htm)

If you have any further questions, let me know.

i forwarded all the ports but i still get DCs

In that case, your issue is likely related to other local network settings that could be conflicting with League. I'd recommend working through all of the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps helped.
